body:
Hi Francesco,



By that sentence I meant better integration between Honeybee and Butterfly.



Back to acoustics we ended up not integrating it into Ladybug Tools. There were several reasons for it including that it needs a different set of skills that none of the current core developers have. The good news is that Arthur has started implementing Pachyderm functionalities to Grasshopper. Check his work here: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/pachyderm](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/pachyderm)



Mostapha
